statement.tex: \text{If }\ora{a}=\hat\imath+2\hat\jmath -\hat {\it k}, \ora{b}=2\hat\imath+\hat\jmath +\hat {\it k} \text{ and } \\ \ora{c}=5\hat\imath -4\hat\jmath+3\hat {\it k}, \text{then find the value of} \\ (\ora{a}+\ora{b})\cdot\ora{c}.

step.reason: \begin{align} (\ora{a}+\ora{b})\cdot \ora{c} &=(3\hat\imath+3\hat\jmath)\cdot(5\hat\imath -4\hat\jmath+3\hat{\it k}) \\ &={\bf 15\hat\imath\cdot\hat\imath}-12\hat\imath\cdot\hat\jmath +9\hat\imath\cdot\hat{\it k}+ \\ &\quad 15\hat\jmath\cdot\hat\imath-{\bf 12\hat\jmath\cdot\hat\jmath} +9\hat\jmath\cdot\hat{\it k} \\ &\begin{tabular}{|c|c|} \hline \theta & \ora{A}\cdot\ora{B}=|A||B|\cos\theta \\ \hline \pi/2 & 0 \\ 0 & |A|\times|B| \\ \hline \end{tabular}\\ &=15-12=3 \end{align} \\ \hat\imath, \hat\jmath, \hat{\it k} \text{ are orthogonal to each other, }\theta=\pi/2
